price: 52.Ama korosuk Qaadaa kee taama firqawnaa kce kay maraay keenik duma warreeh Yallih astootil koroosite mari luk suge Qaadaa kee taamah inna, tokkel Yalli usun aben dambitteh sabbatah ken yibbixeeh ken finqiseh, diggah Yalli Qande-li gibdi digaala-li kinni.
arabic: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيّٞ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kadabi āli fir'ʿawna wa-alladhīna min qablihim kafarū biāyāti al-lahi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunūbihim inna al-laha qawiyyun shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
